title: Code Name Verity
description: Librarian's Note: This is an alternate cover edition ISBN-10: 1405258217 / ISBN-13: 9781405258210I have two weeks. You'll shoot me at the end no matter what I do.11th October 1943: A British spy plane crashes in Nazi-occupied France. Its pilot and passenger are best friends. One of the girls has a shot at survival. The other has lost the game before it's barely begun.Devastating, shocking, compelling and inspiring - once read, never forgotten.
author: Elizabeth Wein
